Shiny Weapons Bundle: Locked and Loaded
kDesc

Contains the full set of all 9 Shiny weapons for No Man's Land, this bundle comes with the following items: 
 
 1. Dagger B-4 Semi-automatic Pistol - Shiny 
 2. Styx-Lethe T-67 Automatic Pistol - Shiny 
 3. Kretsky Anvil Revolver - Shiny 
 4. Kretsky Slugger Assault Rifle - Shiny 
 5. Wulff C-6 Carnivore Assault Rifle - Shiny 
 6. Styx-Lethe Grinder Machine Gun - Shiny 
 7. Kretsky Leviathan Machine Gun - Shiny 
 8. Machete M-C3 Sniper Rifle - Shiny 
 9. Kretsky KS-9 Sniper Rifle - Shiny [#Legal]

Ce pack complet, qui contient les 9 armes Shiny pour No Man's Land, est fourni avec les éléments suivants : 
 
 1. Pistolet semi-automatique Dagger B-4 - Shiny 
 2. Pistolet automatique Styx & Lethe T-67 - Shiny 
 3. Revolver Kretsky Anvil - Shiny 
 4. Fusil d'assaut Kretsky Slugger - Shiny 
 5. Fusil d'assaut Wulff C-6 Carnivore - Shiny 
 6. Mitrailleuse Styx & Lethe Grinder - Shiny 
 7. Mitrailleuse Kretsky Leviathan - Shiny 
 8. Fusil de précision Machette M-C3 - Shiny 
 9. Fusil de précision Kretsky KS-9 - Shiny 
 [#Legal]

Enthält das komplette Set aller 9 Shiny-Waffen for No Man's Land. Dieses Bündel umfasst die folgenden Artikel: 
 
 1. Dagger B-4 Halbautomatische Pistole - Shiny 
 2. Styx & Lethe T-67 Automatische Pistole - Shiny 
 3. Kretsky Anvil Revolver - Shiny 
 4. Kretsky Slugger Sturmgewehr - Shiny 
 5. Wulff C-6 Carnivore Sturmgewehr - Shiny 
 6. Styx & Lethe Grinder Maschinengewehr - Shiny 
 7. Kretsky Leviathan Maschinemgewehr - Shiny 
 8. Machete M-C3 Scharfschützengewehr - Shiny 
 9. Kretsky KS-9 Scharfschützengewehr - Shiny [#Legal]

Contiene tutte e 9 le armi Shiny per No Man's Land. Il set è composto dai seguenti elementi: 
 
 1. Pistola semiautomatica Dagger B-4 - Shiny 
 2. Pistola automatica T-67 Styx & Lethe - Shiny 
 3. Revolver Kretsky Anvil - Shiny 
 4. Fucile mitragliatore Kretsky Slugger - Shiny 
 5. Fucile mitragliatore Wulff C-6 Carnivore - Shiny 
 6. Mitragliatrice Grinder Styx & Lethe - Shiny 
 7. Mitragliatrice Kretsky Leviathan - Shiny 
 8. Fucile di precisione Machete M-C3 - Shiny 
 9. Fucile di precisione Kretsky KS-9 - Shiny [#Legal]

Contiene el set completo de 9 armas Shiny para No Man's Land, y consta de los artículos siguientes: 
 
 1. Dagger B-4 Pistola semiautomática - Shiny 
 2. Styx & Lethe T-67 Pistola automática - Shiny 
 3. Kretsky Anvil Revólver - Shiny 
 4. Kretsky Slugger Rifle de asalto - Shiny 
 5. Wulff C-6 Carnivore Rifle de asalto - Shiny 
 6. Styx & Lethe Grinder Ametralladora - Shiny 
 7. Kretsky Leviathan Ametralladora - Shiny 
 8. Machete M-C3 Rifle Francotirador - Shiny 
 9. Kretsky KS-9 Rifle Francotirador - Shiny [#Legal]

No Man's Land를 위한 9개의 샤이니 무기 세트입니다. 이 번들은 아래의 아이템을 포함합니다: 
 
 1. 대거 B-4 반자동 권총 - 샤이니 
 2. 스틱스-레테 T-67 자동 권총 - 샤이니 
 3. 크레츠키 모루 리볼버 - 샤이니 
 4. 크레츠키 슬러거 돌격소총 - 샤이니 
 5. 울프 C-6 포식자 돌격소총 - 샤이니 
 6. 스틱스-레테 분쇄기 기관총 - 샤이니 
 7. 크레츠키 리바이어던 기관총 - 샤이니 
 8. 마세티 M-C3 저격소총 - 샤이니 
 9. 크레츠키 KS-9 저격소총 - 샤이니 [#Legal]

 8. Machete M-C3 狙擊步槍 - 閃耀
